TASK: Craft an item of type: gray_stained_glass
inventory=[{"type": "leather_horse_armor", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "quartz", "quantity": 30, "index": 11}, {"type": "bricks", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "sand", "quantity": 8, "index": 16}, {"type": "lead", "quantity": 46, "index": 19}, {"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "conduit", "quantity": 11, "index": 30}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 32}, {"type": "acacia_pressure_plate", "quantity": 54, "index": 35}, {"type": "chipped_anvil", "quantity": 34, "index": 38}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 56, "index": 43}]

thought: To craft gray stained glass I need to first craft gray dye. Gray dye is crafted by combining 1 black dye and 1 white dye in the crafting grid. Therefore I will first move the white dye from slot 25 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 32 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 2
